page.common-story.title: Common story generator
page.common-story.description: Discover a limitless interactive storytelling experience with our multiple-choice story generator that takes into account each user's choice.
page.user-story.title: Personal story generator
page.user-story.description: Discover a limitless interactive storytelling experience with our choice-based story generator. Immerse yourself in captivating adventures where your decisions influence the course of story.
TopicsScreen.title.h1: Choose a topic for your story
SaveModal.public.title: Save and publish your story
SaveModal.private.title: Save your story in private
SaveModal.public.text: By posting your story, you will allow all users to see it. To continue, please choose a title for your story.
SaveModal.private.text: By choosing to save your story as private, only you will be able to view it. You can change this setting later. You can change this choice later. Choose a title for your story.
SaveModal.input.title.label: Story title
RestartStoryModal.title: Start a new story
RestartStoryModal.text: Want to start a new story? You can delete the current story or save it to resume later.
DeleteModal.title: Delete story
DeleteModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this story?
ConfirmRedirectToSettingsModal.title.ope: No credit on your OpenAI key
ConfirmRedirectToSettingsModal.text.open: Your OpenAI key is not valid. Do you want to be redirected to the settings to change your key?
Your OpenAI key does not have enough credit. Do you want to be redirected to the settings to change your key?
You don't have an OpenAI key. Do you want to be redirected to the settings to add one?
